description:
There was a time when blocking access to explicit adult content (pornography) simply involved positioning the family computer in the living room so you could keep an eye on it and installing netnanny to block adult content. Now, with your kids accessing the internet on tablets, smartphones, gaming consoles, laptops and PCs, what can you do to block access in the home and also when they are out and about using their mobile?

You will learn how to restrict your child from accessing explicit adult websites, search results, images in search results, videos on Youtube, websites on their mobile and apps on their mobile. We will show you step by step how to

  • Install a free wifi filter at home to block adult content on all devices such as tablets, laptops, xbox, smartphones
  • Install and lock safe search on Google, Bing and Youtube to stop your child stumbling upon adult content on PC / Laptop
  • How to block access to adult website and age inappropriate apps on iphones / ipads, ipods plus Android phones and tablets.
title: How to block pornography on your childs' internet devices
